description.narrative: By 2020, the justice and protection systems have increased capacity to provide children and adolescents in contact with the law with a second chance.

sector.narrative: Access to child-friendly police and justice sector services
Alternative care reform and service provision
Justice sector workforce strengthening and capacity building (including police)
Promoting diversion and alternatives to deprivation of liberty

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order policy, planning and administration

title.narrative: Turkey United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, the justice and protection systems have increased capacity to provide children and adolescents in contact with the law with a second chance.

description.narrative: Implementation of the UNICEF-supported programmes for child-friendly interview facilities and alternatives for imprisonment were enhanced and significant policy changes were adopted at the national level to improve the respect for children's rights in the justice system. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2020

title.narrative: Existence of specialized justice for children systems, such as capacity building and standards-setting within criminal and civil justice systems

baseline.value: Administration of specialized justice for children systems is not existent

target.value: 2020:An administrative body to oversee JFC policies is establishedand operational

actual.value: 2019:Rules of procedure and SOPs drafted in form of a Presidential Decree and pending adoption

title.narrative: Existence of procedures and services for children in contact with law that are applied and delivered in line with international norms

baseline.value: Child friendly services for child in contact with the law are delivered in 30 Judicial Interview Rooms for Children (JIRC) in 23 provinces

target.value: 2019:Services for children in contact with the law are delivered in 62 Judicial Interview Rooms for Children (JIRC) in 49 provinces

actual.value: 2019:Services for children in contact with law are delivered in 61 Judicial Interview Rooms for Children Legal framework is adopted by the Parliament. 142 Arabic-language translators who support judicial interviews of refugee children where were equipped with the necessary skills on child friendly interv
